channel.title: Hosting Problems/Now connecting problems (Edit)
channel.description:
[code]Hey, I'm having hosting problems, I used a guide on these forums, which uses uTorrent and No-Ip. I did the right things with uTorrent, I'm assuming you just make a no-ip account and host a thingy?
Then I have run No-ip, and uTorrent and my server files, and tried to connect using the IP from my no-ip account. It fails.
Also when I try to run the runserver.bat it says Starting Funscape 0.0.0.0:43954. Is my IP supposed to be in the "0.0.0.0" place? If so, tell me how to fix it please. :|
Then I try using Silab client to connect, and it doesn't work. Oh, and when I try to run it through the compiler, it says I don't have JDK 5.0 or 6.0. Can someone give me the links for this? I downloaded JDK version 6 update 7.. and still doesn't recognize it.
PLEASE HELP :D WILL BE MUCH APPRECIATED. Can offer mod on my server when it runs.
EDIT: Link to guide; http://www.gamerzplanet.net/forums/runescape-private-servers/270558-hosting-without-port-forwarding.html[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 23, 2008, 07:18:48 am[/size][hr]This is soo frustrating! I'm using a source which I got off another site. But still.. I just want to play it! All my friends want to play it too..[/code] ^ Original Post.
Ok, now I'm having troubles connecting to my own server. I know it is working because my friends are online. Someone please help me?

item.dc:creator: @Conroy Conroy
item.description:
@Conroy wrote:

i have had problems like this before what i did is delete the ip i had atm and added it again and all worked if it doesnt work then idk sorry

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @KaleScape KaleScape
item.description:
@KaleScape wrote:

OK! I GOT THE SERVER TO CONNECT! But, one small problem, I can’t seem to connect to my server via Silab Client, but my friends can, anyone help?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 23, 2008, 08:45:31 am[/size][hr]Ugh, I so want to play my server! Please someone help me.

Read full topic

download no-ip duc
second log in
third make a .no-ip.
4th tick the box make sure its blusing

try and log with the no-ip. u made[/quote]

Done every bit of that, “Error connecting to server”

item.title: Hosting Problems/Now connecting problems (Edit)
item.dc:creator: @KaleScape KaleScape
item.description:
@KaleScape wrote:

[code]Hey, I’m having hosting problems, I used a guide on these forums, which uses uTorrent and No-Ip.
I did the right things with uTorrent, I’m assuming you just make a no-ip account and host a thingy?

Then I have run No-ip, and uTorrent and my server files, and tried to connect using the IP from my no-ip account. It fails.

Also when I try to run the runserver.bat it says Starting Funscape 0.0.0.0:43954. Is my IP supposed to be in the “0.0.0.0” place? If so, tell me how to fix it please.

Then I try using Silab client to connect, and it doesn’t work.
Oh, and when I try to run it through the compiler, it says I don’t have JDK 5.0 or 6.0. Can someone give me the links for this? I downloaded JDK version 6 update 7… and still doesn’t recognize it.

PLEASE HELP WILL BE MUCH APPRECIATED.
Can offer mod on my server when it runs.

EDIT: Link to guide; http://www.gamerzplanet.net/forums/runescape-private-servers/270558-hosting-without-port-forwarding.html[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 23, 2008, 07:18:48 am[/size][hr]This is soo frustrating! I’m using a source which I got off another site. But still… I just want to play it!
All my friends want to play it too…[/code]
^ Original Post.

Ok, now I’m having troubles connecting to my own server. I know it is working because my friends are online.
Someone please help me?
